News.headline: Tickets: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers' trip to the Crabble Athletic Ground on Saturday 3rd December, 3:00pm KO.
News.description:
Please note that tickets will be pay on the day only for this game.

Ticket Prices:

Standing:
Adults: £15.00
Over 60's: £12.00
Under 18s: £6.00
Under 11s: FREE

Cost of transfer to a seated stand:
Adults: £1.50
Over 60's & Under 18s: £1.00
Under 11's: Free

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:

Dover Athletic also have spaces available in the Family Stand for wheelchair using supporters and, if required, any accompanying carer.

In addition, Dover’s staff and stewards will always be available to assist where possible with providing any disabled supporter with a viewing point from the ground that they require.

It is Dover Athletic club policy that one helper with any disabled person using a wheelchair receives their admission to the ground free of charge. The wheelchair using fan is required to pay the normal admission price for that particular game.
